source.name: American Forces Press Service News Widget
source.description: The AFPS News widget makes it easy for anyone with a Web site, blog or social networking page to carry the latest AFPS articles on their site. The widget works through an XML stream to allow Web sites to carry the latest official news and information about the Defense Department.
